attributes.action: Scrap car parking charges in all nhs hospitals in the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Car parking charges are immoral and unethical.
Patients,relatives and staff should not be charged to attend hospital or come to there work.
Band together to rid our country of this immoral act by hospital management

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap car parking charges in all nhs hospitals in the uk."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15307.asp

Prime Minister's Office
